content: baby bear mitts yarn fingering gauge 8 sts/ 2 5 cm needles 2 25 mm dpns or size to obtain gauge size newborn - one size 9 cm tall 5 cm wide terms k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together pattern cuff cast on 36 stitches with long tail cast on join in the round k2 p2 around for about 3 cm body knit in stockinette until mitten is 7 cm tall top garter stitch round 1 p around round 2 *knit 7 stitches k2tog* repeat to the end of round round 3 p around round 4 *k 6 stitches k2tog* repeat to the end of round round 5 p around round 6 *k 5 stitches k2tog* repeat to the end of round round 7 p around round 8 *k 4 stitches k2tog* repeat to the end of round round 9 p around round 10 *k 3 stitches k2tog* repeat to the end of round round 11 *p 2 stitches p2 decrease* repeat to the end of round round 12 *k k2tog* repeat to the end of round 8 stitches left cut yarn and thread it through the remaining stitches nose and eyes with left over yarn sew the nose of the bear over the closed stitches on the top of the mittens then sew the eyes over the purl bumps ears pick up and knit 5 stitches in the last stockinette row before the garter stitch top of mitten rounds 1-4 k round 5 k2tog k 3 k2tog round 6 cast off repeat for the second ear make another one weave in ends this pattern may not be sold written work and images are a copyright of ©giuliairene and may not be copied or reproduced in any way
